{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS RP-N14.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless-N300 Range Extender/Access Point |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN14/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |wikidevi = ASUS_RP-N14 |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = RP-N14 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point, range extender, audio streamer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RPN14 |icid = 3568A-RPN14 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.25 |pwr_conn = NEMA 1-15P
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Audio out (3.5 mm) |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/14/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00NEKCN2G |asin_country = GB |asin2 = B00HA1P3JK |asin_country2 = GB |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== * Extends wireless home networking * Streaming music with ASUS AiPlayer app or AirPlay * One-press setup and worry-free connectivity * Full coverage with internal MIMO antennas
===Specifications=== *Product Segment: 802.11b/g/n 2T2R :N300: 300Mbps (2.4GHz, 20/40MHz) *Antenna: 2x internal PCB antenna *Ports: 1x RJ45 for 10/100 BaseT for WAN *Power Supply: :AC Input : 110~240V (50~60Hz) 0.25A :DC Output : 5V with max 1.2A current *Dimensions: 45 x 31 x 85 mm (WxDxH) *Weight: 90 g
Default settings are per the FCC QSG.
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.7tutorials.com/reviewing-asus-rp-n14-range-extender-wireless-networks On '''7Tutorials'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.overclockers.co.uk/showthread.php?p=26045932 On '''Overclockers'''] ===Misc=== *[http://www.likelyanswers.com/6778055/MediaTek-First-To-Bring-80211ac-1t1r-dual-Band-Concurrent-Home-Networks MediaTek press release]
==See also== * [http://www.asus.com/event/2014/network/ASUS_AC_family_chart/solutions.html Asus Wireless AC networking solutions] * [http://www.asus.com/us/site/routers/DD-WRT/ Asus Routers with DD-WRT firmware support] * [http://event.asus.com/2013/nw/ASUSWRT/index.htm AsusWRT Support List] * [http://www.hub.ru/wiki/Devices_ASUS_WL_Routers Devices ASUS Routers]
====Wireless Range Extender==== * [[ASUS RP-N12]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN12/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RP-N53]] N600 (300+300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN53/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RP-AC52]] AC750 (300+433Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC52/ Product Page]
====Wireless Router==== * [[ASUS RT-N54U]] N600 (300+300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN54U/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RT-N14U]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN14U/ Product Page]
